prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The evolution of computer languages has progressed from physical rewiring of vacuum tubes through low-level machine code to high-level languages like Python and JavaScript. The next revolution involves writing software in natural human language.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
